alphaalert:
This game is in beta and bugs may (will) happen
Thanks for testing and come back soon for more updates
Works best with Chrome and Safari
Privacy Policy
Version
choosetutorial: Learn the basics on how to play
axepick:
Axe here!
Click to select,
drag or click on the green arrows
to pick!
axeheroes:
Each player has to choose a team of
five heroes
axechooseorder: The order you place the heroes is very important
axemana:
The total mana will tell the number of
skill cards per turn
(Mana/5)
axeautodeck: When you play online, if you don't pick your team in time, random heroes will be selected for you
axeselectenemy: Click on the enemy tower card to select it
axeendturn: You can always end your turn with the End Turn button
axeunselect: Right click or click on the ground to remove selection
axeselectplayer: Click to select one of your cards on the map now
axesummonselect: You can summon more creeps or click to select one of your heroes on the map
axemove: Drag or click on the green arrows to move a card
axemoveagain: You can only move or attack once per card. Now let's move another hero
axedone:
Your turn is over,
wait for end of the
enemy turn
axeenemymove:
Your enemy is moving...
get ready to battle!
axeattack: Select one of your cards close to the enemy and click on the red arrow to attack
axeskillselect: Your skill cards are picked at the beginning of your turn. Click to select a passive skill
axeskill: Drag or click on a blue arrow to use skill cards. Passive skills go to your left hand
axetoggle:
Toggle skills also
also go to your left hand, you can use them for free
axetoggleoff:
Toggle skills can
also be turned off anytime
axecast: Active skills require mana, so they stay in your right hand
axechannel: Channel skills prevent other actions but may be interrupted
axeend:
Ah! You did it, now you are ready for a real
battle!
axecreep: Select a unit in your left hand. All cards that have no mana requirements go to your left hand
axesummoncreep: Click on a green arrow to summon, remember that the tower will lose 1 HP if that little creep die in battle
chooselibrary: Learn every detail of all cards in the game
librarytesttitle: Test a hero and his skills
clickpick: Click to pick, heroes will spawn in order
pickdeck: Pick your deck, game starts in
towerDescription: Attacks the lowest HP enemy unit in range every turn
reload: Connection to the server was lost. Reload?
